# vDSP.WindowSequence.hamming

**Case**

The Hamming window, used to reduce spectral leakage prior to discrete Fourier transform.

## Declaration

```swift
case hamming
```

## Related Documentation

- **Reducing spectral leakage with windowing**: Multiply signal data by window sequence values when performing transforms with noninteger period signals.
- **vDSP_hamm_window**: Creates a single-precision Hamming window.
- **vDSP_hamm_windowD**: Creates a double-precision Hamming window.

## Enumeration Cases

- **vDSP.WindowSequence.blackman**: The Blackman window, used to reduce spectral leakage prior to discrete Fourier transform.
- **vDSP.WindowSequence.hanningDenormalized**: The denormalized-Hann window, used to reduce spectral leakage prior to discrete Fourier transform.
- **vDSP.WindowSequence.hanningNormalized**: The normalized-Hann window, used to reduce spectral leakage prior to discrete Fourier transform.
